CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01A02

TI_TEXT.P: Строителни и монтажни работи по общо изграждане на сгради
Lavori generali di costruzione di edifici

TITLE.P: RE-ISSUED TC621 North West Construction Hub High Value Framework (2018 to 2022)

SHORT_DESCR.P: The projects let under the Framework Agreement may be of a new-build nature, including: demolition, development, refurbishment or re-modelling of existing properties owned and / or used by the framework users, modular or a combination of all these aspects inclusive of any site related and external works associated with these projects.

TITLE.P: Lot 1 covers construction works referred to in II.2.4 and covers projects each of which are within the value range of GBP 8 000 000 – 15 000 000.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The nature and types of work that may be required are: Modular and portable buildings. Building construction work. Construction work for social facilities other than subsidised residential accommodation. Construction work in connection with the following types of buildings:

Daycare centre, Civic Centre, Crematoria. Cemeteries, buildings relating to law and order or emergency services, buildings of further education, research buildings. Laboratory building, Research and testing facilities, Scientific installations, Meteorological stations, halls of residence, Training facilities. Buildings relating to health. Social services buildings.Subsidised residential accommodation. Retirement homes . Nursing homes. Residential homes . Children's homes. Buildings relating to air transport. Airport buildings. Airport control tower construction . Buildings relating to water transport. Buildings relating to education and research. Kindergarten buildings. Schools Primary / Secondary / Special College buildings. Vocational colleges .Technical colleges. University buildings.Polytechnics Lecture theatres. Language laboratory . Commercial buildings. Shop buildings . Shopping centres .Shop units . Markes. Covered markets. Open-air markets. Office blocks. Warehouses and industrial buildings.Cold-storage installations. Workshops, Abattoirs Agricultural buildings. Barn construction . Industrial buildings. Industrial units. Buildings associated with transport. Buildings relating to road transport. Transport buildings, Bus stations. Car park buildings. Service-area building . Bus garages. Buildings relating to exhibitions. Art gallery Exhibition centres . Museums. Buildings relating to artistic performances. Auditorium construction . Theatres .Libraries. Multimedia library construction . Lecture halls. Buildings of particular historical or architectural interest. Lodging buildings. Hostels . Multifunctional buildings. Buildings relating to leisure, sports, culture, lodging and restaurants. Leisure facilities. Leisure centres. Recreation centres. Sports facilities. Single-purpose sports facilities. Ice rinks. Swimming poosl. Multi-purpose sports facilities Structures for sports ground. Gymnasium construction work. Winter sports facilities construction work. Sports hall construction work. Construction work for art and cultural buildings. Construction work for multi-dwelling buildings and individual houses. Demolition, site preparation and clearance work. Laying of paving. Various surface works. Flatwork. Construction work for houses. Sheltered housing construction work. Houses construction work. Multi-dwelling buildings construction work. Flats construction work. Stadium construction work. Repair and maintenance work in connection with sports facilities. Construction works for recycling station. Construction work for buildings relating to railway transport. Railway station construction work. Special medical building construction work.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: There is an option to extend the framework agreement for this Lot by 1 year, this option shall only taken up at the entire discretion of the Contracting Authority and the Contracting Authority's decision as to whether to extend or not shall be binding and final.

CRITERIA_CANDIDATE.P: As stated in the Request to Participate documents.

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: It is anticipated that one or more of the projects completed under this framework will be wholly or partially financed by European Union Funds

INFO_ADD.P: The overall total value of projects to be commissioned under the Framework as a whole is anticipated to be within the range of GBP 250 000 000 to 1 500 000 000, however, the total value per Lot cannot be established at this time.

OBJECT_DESCR.EU_PROGR_RELATED: It is anticipated that one or more of the projects completed under this framework will be wholly or partially financed by European Union Funds

INFO_ADD.P: The overall total value of projects to be commissioned under the framework as a whole is anticipated to be within the range of GBP 250 000 000 to 1 500 000 000, however, the total value per Lot cannot be established at this time.

The projects let under the Framework Agreement may be of a new-build nature, including: demolition, development, refurbishment or re-modelling of existing properties owned and / or used by the framework users, modular or a combination of all these aspects inclusive of any site related and external works.

The North West Construction Hub (NWCH) wishes to transform the manner in which projects are procured and managed within the North West Region. The NWCH will adopt the principles of partnering through the development of longer term relationships through the supply chain, integrated design and construction teams, shared risk/rewards and performance management. The framework is intended to be used by Manchester City Council trading as the North West Construction Hub, and other North West local authorities but such other bodies as are referred and/or identified below may use and access the framework and each of such bodies may enter into individual call off contracts pursuant to the framework. Applications are invited from suitably experienced and capable providers of construction services who can provide high quality building construction works adopting Constructing Excellence principles and including early contractor involvement when required. Companies should be committed to partnering including working with clients and their partners, shared problem solving and continuous improvement. Call off contracts under the framework agreements will be entered into directly by the framework users and the service providers. There will be no obligation on either NWCH or any of the prospective framework users to enter into call off contracts with the service providers appointed nor will any guarantee be given as to the quantity or regularity of call off contracts to be made.
Prospective framework users are those listed in the Request to Participate Information and Instructions document which can be downloaded from within the chest tendering portal.
This is a restricted process, but any interested party may submit a request to participate.
The Framework will be awarded for an initial term of 3 years with an option to extend for up to 1 additional year.
